sentence: so she called the front desk they came right up and put towels on the floor 0o and all in the hallway
I did fill out the survey for the Spa but I have to tell you the most off putting part of the experiecne was the downstairs area of the Spa

What you could have done to simply meet our expectations would have been to do the minimum required to fulfill the contract you entered into give us a room equipped with the basic necessities and provided the advertised amenities in accordance with reasonable expectations working beds and sufficient linens and access to a pool of some kind either indoor or outdoor given the weather consisted of garden variety cloud cover devoid of rain or any hint of an electric storm
Several families actually brought in lots of food began to set up two tables by the entrance to the pool
I am not sure the booking procedures but when a hotel is not at max capacity why would you put guests directly next to the exit stairwell with a door that constantly slams open and slams shut again
Think Wal Mart caliber at a spa facility that was my 700 one night at the hotel and two treatment experience
Not only did he came off the street to use the gym he would use at least 5 towels and spread them out all over equipment as he was preparing a circuit training course for himself
We were willing to walk down the stairs but had no idea where they were
We were asked to step out into the hallway for several minutes while the gentleman was inside the room presumably talking to the front desk to figure out what to do with us
It disappeared from the lobby mid morning and then we end up having to pay 6 for two coffees of low quality
Always great service good restaurants room serbice nice workout facility
The facility is super clean with very comfortable beds
Workout facility ample parking walking distance to Short Hills Mall
The lobby rooms and rest of hotel were upgraded and well maintained
Lovely lobby and staff tho and nice remodel
Property is very clean and well maintained with excellent facilities
Very nice lobby a d amenities
Electric car charging available and very nice facility
The equipments are neat and clean at the gym well organized
Outstanding service from the lobby to the hotel room
